casebody.data:
John HOOKS, Appellant, v. William H. HARDWICK, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 15696. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. Oct. 19, 1955. John Hooks, in pro. per. James W. Dorsey, U. S. Atty., Harvey H. Tisinger, Asst. U. S. Atty., Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before HUTCHESON, Chief Judge, and BORAH and CAMERON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed. Aderhold v. Hudson, 5 Cir., 84 F.2d 559; Zerbst v. Kidwell, 304 U.S. 359, 58 S.Ct. 872, 82 L.Ed. 1399.
